      • readCol

        public static java.lang.Object readCol​(java.sql.ResultSet rs,
                                       int nCol,
                                       int nType,
                                       boolean is4JSON)
                                throws java.sql.SQLException
        Returns the value for the column designated by received parameters.
        Different RDBMS interpret the same Type constant (v.g. 'Types.REAL') in different ways. Because of that, thje worst scenario has to be taken (the biggest Java data type capacity).
        Parameters:
        rs -
        nCol -
        nType -
        is4JSON - true when the result has to be JSON compatible.
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
